Now she has applied for a loan of 60000 PKR to purchase a stock of more grocery items such as grains, sugar, flour and rice. It will help her to meet customers' demands on time.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of more grocery items such as grains, sugar, flour and rice

loans.name: Jhon Edison

texts.es:
Jhon; desde hace aproximadamente 14 años se dedica a trabajar como comerciante independiente, actividad que aprendió de manera empírica y que surgió de la necesidad de generar recursos para el sustento de su familia; ofrece todo tipo de productos de artesanía y cuenta con la ventaja de que diariamente conoce nuevas personas a las que les puede ofrecer su mercancía, mejorando cada día sus ventas. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar mercancía al por mayor como collares, accesorios para el hogar, y una estantería así podrá abastecerse con más variedad para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en esta temporada; mejorando su nivel de ingresos.

Jhon, con empeño y dedicación, desea seguir trabajando para sacar adelante su negocio, ya que para un futuro cercano, sueña con tener la posibilidad de ampliar su almacén.
texts.en:
For fourteen years, Jhon has been making a living as an independent merchant, work he learned in an empirical manner and which grew out of the necessity to generate resources to sustain his family.  He offers all kinds of artisanal products and has the advantage of daily meeting new people to whom he can offer his merchandise, improving his sales every day.
Now he is requesting the support of a loan in order to buy merchandise wholesale such as necklaces, household accessories, and shelving so he will be able to stock himself with more variety.
With determination and dedication, Jhon wishes to continue working to get his business ahead since in the near future he dreams of having the possibility of expanding his shop.

loans.use: to buy merchandise wholesale such as necklaces, household accessories and shelving so he will be able to stock himself with more variety.

loans.name: Claudia Maritza

texts.es:
Claudia es una mujer de mil batallas vividas a lo largo de su vida, vive en el municipio de La Dorada con su esposo.

Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y acabo de iniciar un negocio de cafetería. 

Su negocio consiste en la preparación y venta de comestibles. Ella ofrece sus productos desde su hogar.

Manifiesta que es un negocio sencillo de realizar para su edad.
Ella solicita un préstamo para compra de surtido de bebidas e ingredientes como carne y harina para estos alimentos.

El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de capitalizar su negocio y de darle un impulso considerable a su actividad, permitiéndole obtener recursos para subsistir.
texts.en:
Claudia is a woman who has struggled a lot throughout her life. She lives in the town La Dorada along with her husband. She is a hardworking woman and has just established a coffee shop. 

Her business consists in preparing and selling food. She offers her products in her house and says that it’s an easy business to manage for her age. 

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies like beverages and ingredients like meat and flour for her dishes. The loan will give her the opportunity to increase her capital and boost her activity, allowing her to gain more resources to persist.

loans.use: to buy supplies like beverages and ingredients like meat and flour for her dishes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy zinc sheets to put a roof on his home.

loans.name: Nestor

texts.es: Nestor   is a married man and he has two sons he has his own house he works as an employee at a private company Nestor needs a loan to pay a medical treatment on his nose because he is not sleeping well he can t breathe at nights because there is something wrong with her nose so he needs to go to the doctor he hopes you can help him again because it is important that he goes to some specialist
texts.en:
Nestor is a married man; he has two sons. He has his own house and he works as an employee at a private company.

Nestor needs a loan to pay for a medical treatment on his nose because he is not sleeping well; he can't breathe at night because there is something wrong with his nose. So he needs to go to the doctor.

He hopes you can help him again because it is important that he goes to a specialist.

loans.use: to pay for a medical treatment on his nose.

loans.name: Abir

texts.en:
Abir, a 36-year-old married mother of a newborn child, has been printing books from her house since 1999 and supplements her income by working as a tutor. Her house is her working place, and she puts so much effort to keep it in a very good condition.

Today Abir is requesting a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to help pay for her new born baby's medical expenses. 

Abir is praying for her child to get better, and hopes to expand her printing business through opening a small office in the future. She will try her best to save as much as she can to make her dream come true.

loans.use: To help her pay for her new born baby's medical expenses

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie works hard to support her family. Rosemarie is married with three children and has a buy and sell dry goods business in the Philippines.

Rosemarie requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF to buy more items of dry goods to sell.

Rosemarie has been in this business for 10 years now, and also earns additional income from general store.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more items of dry goods to sell

loans.name: Juana De La Cruz

texts.es:
Juana agradece la repuesta tan inmediata que ha recibido de Padecomsm y los inversionistas Kiva al solicitar un crédito, requiere de más capital para comprar carnes, embutidos, bebidas, aceite, condimentos, etc., para surtir el inventario de su negocio, su objetivo es seguir atendiendo bien a sus clientes para tener su fuente de ingresos en el mercado.
Con el crédito anterior ha mantenido el comedor y la tienda funcionando, hoy en día su clientela ha crecido, las ganancias han mejorado y presenta un mejor inventario.
texts.en:
Juana is grateful for the very rapid reply she received for Padecomsm and the Kiva investors when requesting a loan.  She requires more capital in order to buy meats, sausages, drinks, oil, condiments, etc. to stock the inventory of her business.  Her objective is to continue serving her customers well so as to have a source of income in the market.
With the previous loan, she kept the diner and shop going.  Now her clientele has grown, the earnings have improved, and she offers a better inventory.

loans.use: to buy meats, sausages, drinks, oil, condiments, etc. in order to stock the inventory of her business.

loans.name: Sumaira

texts.en:
Sumaira is a 32-year-old married woman. She is a mother of three and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food and health. She requests a loan for her husband. He owns a bookshop to sell different courses of books. Due to inflation, he is unable to buy new inventory to sell from his shop. 

This is the reason that Sumaira has requested a Kiva loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan. Sumaira hopes that this loan will prove productive and beneficial for her family. She say thanks to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan

loans.use: to buy inventories for her husband books shop for resale purpose.

loans.name: Luz Belia

texts.es:
Luz, a sus 59 años de edad es casada y madre de 6 hijos. 

Desde pequeña ha tenido un gusto particular por los animales, especialmente por las aves, razón por la cual hace 3 años, con el apoyo de su esposo, comenzó a criar aves de corral y logró tener una muy buena cantidad de animales, así genera ingresos para aportar al sostenimiento de su hogar. 

Luz es una mujer emprendedora e innovadora, siempre va en busca de opciones que le permitan progresar, por esta razón solicita el crédito que será invertido en la compra de materiales para la construcción de un corral mas grande para continuar con el cuidado y cría de todas sus aves, de esta manera podrá tener disponibilidad suficiente para vender y así generar mejores utilidades. 

Ella sueña con tener los recursos suficientes para construir un nivel más en su casa, bien ventilado e iluminado para tener allí a sus animales que sea un punto estratégico de exhibición y venta, así mejorará su nivel de ingresos y podrá ofrecer a su familia una muy buena calidad de vida y bienestar.
texts.en:
Luz is 59 years old, is married, and is the mother of six children. Since she was young, she has had a special liking for animals, especially birds. This is the reason why, three years ago, with the help of her husband, she started to raise poultry and have a good number of animals. This is how she generates income to help support her household. 

Luz is an entrepreneurial and innovative woman who is always looking for options that allow her to move forward. Because of this, she is asking for a loan that will be invested in the purchase of construction materials to build a larger corral in order to continue raising and caring for her poultry. With this she will be able to have sufficient availability of poultry to sell and therefore generate greater profits.

She dreams of having sufficient resources to build another level on her home which would be well ventilated and illuminated so as to have her animals there. It would also be a strategic place to display and sell her poultry. This would improve her level of income and allow her to offer her family a very good quality of life and wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a larger corral and continue to care for and raise her poultry.

loans.name: Aneeta

texts.en:
Aneeta is 39 years old woman, residing in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a mother of three sons. She maintained her household activities properly. 

She has been running a beauty salon for the last few years and is good trained beautician. Due to her efficient and good work, her number of clients increasing day by day. 

So she requires some beauty salon related items such as facial creams, combs, furniture items like dressing chairs, mirrors, etc.  Aneeta contacted  Kiva's field partner BRAC Pakistan. And is thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan,

loans.use: to use this loan for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is not new to the Fresh Life Toilets franchise, earlier this year he purchased two facilities that tenants at his 40 plot units now use.  So far, he has a lot to be proud of since his decision to join the movement; "The Fresh Life Toilets option is very easy to manage particularly with daily waste collection" he says. With highly impassable roads at Mukuru Kwa Njenga, filled up toilets could only be emptied by frogmen, which was not only unhygienic but emitted a bad stench that his tenants were displeased about. 

'My tenants are very happy and satisfied with the Fresh Life Toilets they currently use," Peter says.

With many households at Peter's plot, tenants experience long ques at the toilet facilities especially in the morning. Peter has therefore resolved to put up an additional Fresh Life Toilet so as to serve is tenants better. 

Let us help Peter in his quest of acquiring one Fresh Life Toilet!

loans.use: To pay for One Fresh Life Toilet.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tricycle repair and buy items such as coffee, canned food, noodles, seasoning, eggs, spices, detergent and beverages

loans.name: Emerson David

texts.es: Emerson de 21 años, labora en una ferretería como vendedor de mostrador, toda su vida estuvo ligada al comercio porque su madre realizaba esta actividad y le permitía comercializar algunos productos entre sus amigos y conocidos.  Él reside en compañía de su hijo y su cónyuge en un barrio de la ciudad de Barranquilla y sus ingresos no podían abastecer las necesidades del hogar, entonces decidió ofrecer prendas de vestir y calzado a su conocidos. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en la comprar de nuevo surtido de prendas de vestir y calzado.  Su meta a futuro es continuar ejerciendo la actividad comercial con mucho más capital y más clientes, así mismo acercarse a su sueño de comprar su vivienda para ofrecer bienestar a su hijo.
texts.en: Emerson is 21. He works at a hardware store as a sales rep. His whole life is connected to commerce. His mother is a sales person and she used to let him sell items to friends and acquaintances. He lives with his son and his partner in a neigborhood of the city of Barranquilla. His income was not enough to cover his home expenses, so he decided to start selling clothing to friends. At the moment, he is asking for his first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which he will invest in a new clothing and shoe line. His future goal is to continue growing this business with more capital and more clients, and also get closer to his dream of buying a home to offer his son a better life.

loans.use: to buy a new clothing and shoe line

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
As a single parent of two children, Ruth works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from general store.  Ruth is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to  purchase fishing nets, gasoline for her boat and maintenance to her business.

Ruth has been sustaining her business activities through her past 7 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nest, gasoline for her boat and maintenance to her business

loans.name: Fred

texts.en:
Fred is an old man of around 46 years old, living with his children and a wife. He is involved in farming as a main source of income. He also sells agricultural produce and provides milling services to the community.

According to him, he has been in the above activity for over 25 years.

He has a milling machine stationed in his trading center which also supplements his income. According to him, through the above projects he has been able to buy land plus also take care of his family and sisters.

He has also acquired this facility to boost his agriculture output trade business. According to him, his biggest challenge is lack of enough capital to boost his businesses and bad weather.

loans.use: to buy cereals to sell.

loans.name: Jofule

texts.en:
Jofule is single and aged 32 with two children; both are attending school. He lives in a rural area with the family and deals in cattle keeping as well as farming. He has been in business since 1990 and works all 7 days of the week and 12 hours per day. He started the business to improve the family income and to get school fees for the children.

He is acquiring the loan to purchase cattle for fattening and veterinary drugs for the cows.

His hope for the future is to be the leading supplier of cows and food crops in his home village; the challenge he faces is poor weather conditions leading to poor pastures and therefore low yields.

He describes himself as an honest and hardworking man encouraging lenders to reduce the interest rates.

loans.use: to buy cattle for fattening and selling.

loans.name: Sally

texts.en:
Sally is a 26-year-old Syrian citizen who opened in 2012 her own beauty salon partnership with her brother who accompanies her to reply to the increasing number of customers in order to increase their acquired income and develop their living.

Sally is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to increase her cosmetics and makeup capital with the new released summer collection.
Sally is working hard to develop her business more and to increase and diversify her provided beauty services.

loans.use: To increase her cosmetics and makeup capital with the newly released summer collection

loans.name: Justus

texts.en:
Justus is 38 years old, married and supports a family of 2 children. Her has been practicing farming for the last 4 years earning KES 13,000 per month. 

Justus has applied for KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy a dairy cow for milk production and supply for more income gain. 

He plans to use the anticipated profits to educate his children. 

His future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow for milk production and supply for more income gain

loans.name: Ednah

texts.en:
Ednah is 26 years old, married and supports a family of two children. She has been practicing farming for the last five years earning KES12,000 per month. 

Ednah has applied for her first loan of KES25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya to buy a dairy cow for milk production and supply in the area for more income gain. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to educate her children. Her future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow for milk production and supply in the area for more income gain.

loans.name: Ruthea

texts.en:
Ruthea is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ruthea is 47 years old and has one child still in school.

Ruthea has a dried fish making business in the Philippines. Ruthea requested a PHP 10000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more fish, sacks of salt, fish net and other materials for her business.

Ruthea has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fish, sacks of salt, fish net and other materials for her business

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: Luz Marina de 52 años, inició  su negocio de  servicio de llamadas y recargas, al palpar la necesidad existente entre su comunidad.  Ella todos los días a partir de las 8 a.m. esta dispuesta a recibir desde la comodidad de su vivienda a los interesados en realizar recargas y llamadas a todos los operadores celulares,  así mismo elabora y comercializa chichas y bolis de frutas.  Cada día la demanda de estos servicios es mayor y su capital es insuficiente para compra paquetes de minutos y recargas, por eso está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar paquetes de minutos. Luz marina tiene como meta mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y capitalizarse para continuar en sus negocios.
texts.en: Luz Marina is 52 years old. She started her business of calls and phone recharges by noticing the existing need in her community. Starting at 8 in the morning, in the comfort of her home she is ready to receive those interested in having recharges and calls to all cell phone operators There, she also prepares and sells chichas (drink) and fruit ice cream. Each day, the demand for these services is bigger and her capital is insufficient to buy packets of minutes and recharges. For this, she is requesting her first credikiva through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, in order to buy packets of minutes. Luz Marina's goal is to improve the conditions of her house and to get the capital to continue with her business.

loans.use: to buy packets of minutes.

loans.name: Salve Caryl

texts.en:
Salve Caryl is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Salve Caryl is 34 years old and has one child who is in school.

Salve Caryl has a buy and sell kitchen wares business in the Philippines. Salve Caryl requested a PHP 10000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more stocks of kitchen wares to sell.

Salve Caryl has been in this business for 3 years. Salve Caryl would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of kitchen wares to sell

loans.name: Shahnaz

texts.en:
Shahnaz is 33-years-old, married woman. She is been involved in the business of selling stitched and un-stitch cloth. She always has a great collection to offer to her customers. She has a strong customer base. 

Shahnaz  has requested for a loan of 45000 PKR.  She wants to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business to get a boost in her earnings with her loan. She dreams of expanding her business in the near future.

loans.use: to buy greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business to get boost in her earnings with her loan

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es:
Jose es una persona muy simpática y siempre tiene una sonrisa para los clientes que visitan su tienda de abarrotes en zona rural del municipio de Titiribi.
Gracias a su carisma y buen humor se ha podido ganar el corazón y reconocimiento de las personas del sector que siempre prefieren visitar su tienda para adquirir sus productos.

Todos los días trabaja para darle una buena calidad de vida  a su familia.

Actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar pintura y materiales para realizar reformas a su tienda y de esta forma darle un impulso significativo a su negocio.

El guarda la esperanza de poder continuar con su negocio y así seguir impactando la vida de sus clientes a través de su buen servicio.
texts.en:
Jose is a very friendly person who always has a smile for the clients who visit his grocery store in a rural area of the municipality of Titiribi. Thanks to his charisma and good disposition, he has been able to win the hearts and recognition of the people in this area who always prefer to visit his store to purchase their goods.

He works every day to provide a good quality of life for his family. He is currently asking for a loan to buy paint and materials to make improvements to his store and significantly boost his business. He hopes to be able to continue with his business and thus continue impacting the lives of his clients through his good service.

loans.use: to buy paint and materials to make improvements to his store and significantly boost his business.

loans.name: Ejell

texts.en:
This is Ejell and his wife, Marije, both being in their early 60's and parents of two, who live in the northern part of the country. For these past 25 years, their focus has been on agriculture, mainly on livestock. 

"We have a little animal farm here, with 30 cows from which we sell about 55 kg of raw milk a day,  most of the months. We have a sow also and sell about 10 piglets a year, and in the 7 dynym of agricultural land we own, we basically plant feed for the animals and around the house, in our yard, we plant veggies and other things for us to use," said Marije to the loan officer.  
 
Agriculture/livestock has been the only source of income for the family now, for all these past two decades. The loan is needed to buy corn for feeding to their livestock.

loans.use: to buy corn for the livestock which is the only source of income for the family

loans.name: Jeresa

texts.en:
Jeresa is 55 years old and married with four children.

She is in agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Jeresa is borrowing PHP 6000 through NWTF to buy feeds, vaccine, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pig.

Jeresa has been in this business for 6 years and also earns additional income from general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to  save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vaccine, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pig

loans.name: Gustavo Manuel

texts.es:
Gustavo desde hace 20 años se dedica a la producción agrícola y diariamente se levanta para trabajar y atender sus tierras en las cuales tiene cultivos principalmente de plátano.

Es una actividad aprendida de manera empírica y poco a poco ha ido perfeccionando sus técnicas y habilidades en este campo.

Adicionalmente genera ingresos alternos gracias a su trabajo como jornalero.

Hoy en día se siente orgulloso de lo que ha podido construir con su esfuerzo y se siente muy agradecido con la Corporación Interactuar y los prestamistas de Kiva por las oportunidades que le brindan de progresar.

El pide un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de abonos, riegos y pesticidas, de este modo mantener sus tierras en optimas condiciones para los cultivos.

Su mayor sueño es tener una casa propia y allí poder disfrutar de su vejez al lado de su esposa.
texts.en:
For 20 years, Gustavo has worked in agricultural production. He wakes up everyday to go to work and care for his land in which he has crops, primarily plantains.

This is a skill that he learned on his own and, little by little, has perfected his techniques and abilities in this field. He also earns alternate income thanks to his work as a day laborer.

Presently, he is proud of all that he has been able to build with his efforts. He is very thankful for Corporación Interactuar and Kiva lenders for the opportunities that they provide for improvement.

He is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of fertilizers, an irrigation system, and pesticides to be able to maintain his lands in an optimal condition for his crops. His greatest dream is to have his own home and be able to enjoy growing old with his wife.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, an irrigation system, and pesticides to maintain his land in an optimal condition for his crops.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
Violeta is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Violeta is 54 years old and has two children who are still in school.

Violeta has a food vending business in the Philippines. Violeta requested a PHP 14000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Violeta has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, Violeta would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en:
Bushra is the age of 31, mother of two children, living with her spouse and children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is a greengrocer by profession and he has sold fresh vegetables at a shop in a nearby town for many years. Her husband offers seasonal and fresh vegetables to his customers. He has been feeding his family through the generated income from this vegetable shop. 

Nowadays, the needs of his family suddenly increased and he does not have other sources to cope with these needs. So he decided to expand his current business. He wants to increase his stock on a daily basis so that he can maximize sales out of the vegetable. So Bushra asked for a loan so her husband would be able to buy more vegetables for selling.

Bushra is very thankful to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy vegetables in bulk for her husband shop.

loans.name: Erlin Isabel

texts.es: Erlin, inspirada en su deseo de ser una trabajadora independiente y tener su propio negocio, decidió crear un club de nutrición para personas que están en proceso de bajar de peso o que realizan actividades físicas y desean aumentar su masa muscular.  Ella ofrece  una variada gama de malteadas, proteínas, té, energizantes y demás productos, por porciones desde su local o para los clientes que desean tener estos suplementos en casa les ofrece las presentaciones de cada producto.  En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en productos como malteadas, té, proteínas y demás. Esta inversión está enfocada hacia la captación de nuevos clientes e incrementar su cobertura y con ello aumentar su flujo de caja, encaminado a mejorar su calidad de vida. Erlin de 44 años desea que sus tres hijas puedan acceder a la educación superior y adquirir un local propio.
texts.en:
Erlin, inspired by her hopes to be an independent worker and to have her own business, decided to create a nutrition club for people who are in the process of losing weight or who participate in physical activities and want to increase their muscle mass. She offers a wide range of shakes, proteins, tea, energy drinks and other products, which are available in her store or by delivery for clients who want these supplements at home.
 
She is currently applying for her first Kiva loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which she will invest in products like shakes, tea, protein and others. This investment will be focused on acquiring new clients and increasing her coverage. This will increase her cash flow, making way for a better quality of life. Forty-four year old Erlin wants to purchase her own store and giver her three children access to higher education.

loans.use: to invest in products like shakes, tea, proteins, and others.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.es:
Wilson hombre de 37 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 1 hijo de 10 años y 1 hija de 14 años, y trabaja en el tratamiento del suelo y los cultivos de vegetales.
Él es buen padre, fuerte, luchador, constante, decidido, responsable y muy trabajadoro. Su trabajo lo realiza en la zona ‘villa tunari’ que se encuentra en una región de gran belleza natural, en la confluencia de 2 ríos, que al unirse forman el río Chapare. El clima es lluvioso y tropical, con temperaturas de hasta 35 grados Centigrados, por lo que resulta una lluvia tibia, muy agradable. El pueblo se encuentra en medio de la selva tropical, rodeado de gran vegetación y una amplia variedad de fauna.
Wilson es de tez trigueña, ojos pardos, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, y su lengua materna es el Quechua que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el trabajo que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que trabaja en la agricultura, viven en una casa propia construida de madera y adobe con techo de calamina y piso de tierra que cuenta con energía eléctrica y agua de pozo extraída mediante bomba, no cuenta con alcantarillado. Él se dedica al tratamiento del suelo, removiendo las tierras y abonándolas para crear una estructura favorable para que la siembra y cosecha sea rápida y uniforme y permita a las nuevas plantas tener un fácil acceso a los recursos vitales de los nutrientes, el agua y la aireación, actividad que comparte con su pareja y con sus hijos. Actualmente el gobierno nacional decidió mejorar la calidad de vida de estas comunidades otorgándoles el derecho al uso de agua potable, “consumimos agua sucia de pozo, lavamos nuestras prendas con agua contaminada de rio y constantemente nos enfermamos por tomar agua sucia…” comenta. La ventaja de su pueblo es que el gobierno les otorgó el derecho al uso del agua potable, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la instalación de agua potable en su cocina baño y lavandería. Su sueño es usar agua potable, ella desea realizar la instalación de agua potable a su cocina, baño y lavandería para que su familia deje de beber agua sucia. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que construye su casa.
Es por esos motivos que Wilson solicita un préstamo para la instalación de agua potable en su cocina, baño y lavandería para dejar de beber agua sucia.
texts.en:
Wilson is 37 years old. He lives with his partner, he has a 10-year-old boy and a 14-year-old girl and he works in soil treatment and vegetable growth.
He is a good father. Strong, a fighter, reliable, determined, responsible and very hardworking. He works in the ‘Villa Tunari’ area, a region with great natural beauty, where 2 rivers meet forming the Chapare river. Weather is rainy and tropical, with temperatures up to 95 F, so rain is warm and very pleasant. The town is in the middle of a tropial forest, surrounded by large vegetation and a vast variety of fauna.
Wilson has dark skin, brown eyes, short black hair, he is short, thin and his first language is Quechua, spoken in the region and he also speaks Spanish for general knowledge and for work. He shares his life with his partner and they both work in agriculture. They live in a house that they own built out of wood and brick with corrugated iron roofing and dirth flooring. They have electricity and well water extracted by pump. They don't have a sewage system.
He works in soil treatment, removing dirth and adding compost to create a more favorable structure for planting and harvesting to be fast and uniform and to allow new crops to have easy access to important resources such as nutrients, water, ventilation. He shares this activity with his partner and children. Currently, the goverment decided to improve the quality of life of these communities granting them the right to drinking water, "we drink well water, we wash our clothes with contaminated river water, and we are sick all the time because we drink dirty water..." he says. The advantage of this town is that the goverment has granted them the right to use drinking water, the disadvantage is the lack of capital to install a drinking water system in his kitchen, bathroom and laundry room. Her dream is to use drinking water. He wants to install this system in his kitchen, bathroom and laundry room so his family can stop drinking dirty water. This is his first set of loans with this bank in 5 years since he started buinding his home.
For this reason, Wilson is asking for a loan to install a drinking water system in his kitchen, bathroom and laundry room so he can stop drinking dirty water.

loans.use: to install a drinking water system in his kitchen, bathroom and laundry room to stop drinking dirty water.

loans.name: Delmi Del Rosario

texts.es:
Delmi, de 47 años de edad, está acompañada, estudio hasta tercer grado, es madre de 4 hijos, todos ya están acompañados y su compañero de vida se dedica a la pesca.

Delmi, se dedica a la venta de pescado, este trabajo lo realiza su pareja desde que era joven y el pescado lo extrae del mar y ella solo se dedica a venderlo casa por casa o se traslada a lugares aledaños.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar una hielera para poder movilizar el pescado a otros lugares para que no se le arruine.

El sueño de Delmi, es mejorar su negocio y que siga creciendo, para poder salir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Delmi is 47 years old and has a domestic partner. She studied up to third grade. She is the mother of 4 children, all of whom have domestic partners. Her partner works as a fisherman. Delmi works selling fish. Her husband does this job since he was young and gets the fish from the ocean She takes care of selling it at home or in neighboring places. She needs the loan to buy an ice chest to transport the fish to other places so it does not get spoiled. Delmi's dream is to improve her business so it continues to grow in order to move forward and improve her life quality.

loans.use: to buy an ice chest to transport the fish to other places so it does not get spoiled.

loans.name: Ovidia

texts.es:
Ovidia, de 65 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y su pequeño nieto.

Ovidia, es dueña de ganado bovino desde hace 20 años, gracias a su arduo trabajo y a los beneficios de la leche que obtienen de dicho ganado, ella puede realizar diversos tipos de alimentos, los cuales ellos posteriormente los comercializan, por ejemplo, queso, cuajada, requesón, entre otros.

El crédito solicitado lo necesita para alquilar un terreno donde su ganado se pueda alimentar y estar más seguro.

Sus planes a futuro es tener más ganado y continuar en este negocio, además sueña con mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ovidia, age 65, lives with her husband and their young grandson.

Ovidia has owned dairy cows for 20 years now, and thanks to her hard work and the profits from the milk they give, she is able to make and sell various dairy products, including cheese, cheese curds, and cottage cheese. 

She will use this loan to rent a parcel of land where her cattle can feed and be more secure.

Her plans for the future include having more cattle and continuing in this line of work. She also hopes to improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: rent some land where her cattle can graze safely

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy drinks, water, firewood, liquefied gas, snacks, bread, basic grains, etc., to prepare for the sale of tortillas and to improve the store’s inventory.

loans.name: Grupo Sector La Cuchilla 1 Group

texts.es:
Debora (la primera del lado izquierdo de la foto) es amable, sincera estas son las cualidades que lo caracterizan en su comunidad, ella tiene 23 años, casada con dos hijos de las edades entre 3 y 5 años, ellos viven en el lugar denominado San Antonio.
Debora para obtener algo de ingresos y sacar adelante a sus hijos se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa típica, ella eligió esta actividad porque es muy rentable; y en su comunidad toda la gente utiliza esta vestimenta, por lo que es más productivo.
Debora  ha tomado la iniciativa de solicitar un préstamo con el propósito de realizar una inversión en su negocio comprando una variedad de colores estilos de ropa típica; para satisfacer mejor las necesidades de los clientes.
Ella sueña con poder contar con un local donde pueda exhibir mejor sus productos y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Debora (the first on the left in the photo) is friendly and sincere. These are the qualities she is known for in her community She is 23 years old, married and has two children aged 3 and 5 years old. They live in a place that is called San Antonio.

In order to obtain some income and raise her children Debora works buying and selling traditional clothing. She chose this activity because it is very profitable and everyone in her community uses this type of clothing, so her business is more productive.

Debora has taken the initiative to request a loan with the goal of making an investment in her business buying a variety of colors and styles of traditional clothing to better satisfy the needs of her customers.

She dreams of having a store where she can exhibit her products better and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy and sell traditional clothing.

loans.name: Paraje Galan Uno Group

texts.es:
Hector es un agricultor de 44 años de edad, del Departamento de Santa Ana, el forma parte del grupo solidario Paraje Galan uno, todos sus miembros se dedican a la agricultura.
Hector, esta acompañado, estudio hasta sexto grado de educacion primaria, ya que por ser de escasos recursos, su familia lo puso a trabajar desde muy joven, para ayudar al sostenimiento de la misma. tiene un hijo de quince años de edad el cual por falta de recursos, actualmente no estudia.
Hector tiene veinticuatro años de experiencia en cultivar granos basicos ( maiz, maicillo y frijol.), actividad que le permitió en su momento colaborar con sus padres , en este momento eso le ayuda al sostenimiento de su grupo familiar.
Hector necesita el credito para la compra de insumos agricolas, para la siembra y manejo del cultivo de granos basicos,pues él espera que estos le generen los ingresos necesarios para poder seguir brindando a su hijo el estudio que necesita y asi tener mejores oportunidades, logrando cumplir sus sueños de verlo como profesional, mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hector, age 44, is a farmer from the Department of Santa Ana. He is part of the unified group Paraje Galan Uno, all of whose members are farmers.

Hector is married. He studied through the sixth grade, but then due to his family's economic situation, he had to leave school and start working to help support the family. He has a fifteen-year-old son who, due to their own lack of resources, is not currently in school.

Hector has 24 years of experience growing basic grains such as corn, sorghum, and beans. This work lets him work with his parents, and at this time is what is supporting the entire family.

Hector needs this loan to purchase farming supplies and pay for the planting and cultivation of grains. He expects that these will generate enough income that he can continue to provide his son with the education he needs to have better opportunities. Hector's goal is to see his son become a professional, improving his quality of life.

loans.use: buy farming supplies

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen es una mujer de 37 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 1 hijo de 14 años y 1 hija de 16 años, y trabaja en agricultura.
Ella es buena madre, fuerte, luchadora, constante, decidida, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su trabajo lo realiza en la zona ‘Jatun pampa’ área rural, para llegar a su casa debe cruzar las caudalosas aguas del rio, embarcada en una “oroya” (canasto metálico sujetado por correas). De clima templado durante todo el año con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 15-28 grados centígrados.
Carmen es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su forma de vestir es tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), y su lengua materna es el Quechua que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que trabaja en la agricultura, viven en una casa propia construida de adobe, ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de tierra que cuenta con energía eléctrica y agua de pozo extraída mediante bomba eléctrica, no cuenta con alcantarillado. Ella se dedica a la agricultura, sembrando y cosechando la tierra, actividad que comparte con su pareja y con sus hijos. Recientemente el gobierno nacional decidió ayudar a estas comunidades otorgándoles el derecho al uso de agua potable, “en este lugar nunca tuvimos agua potable, usamos agua de pozo y de rio, ambas están sucias y contaminadas…” comenta. La ventaja de su comunidad es que ya cuenta con agua potable, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la instalación de agua potable dentro del hogar. Su sueño es contar con agua potable, ella desea realizar la instalación de agua potable a su cocina, baño y lavandería para dejar de utilizar agua contaminada. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 6 años que construye su casa.
Es por esos motivos que Carmen solicita un préstamo para la instalación de agua potable en su cocina, baño y lavandería para dejar de utilizar agua contaminada.
texts.en:
Carmen is a 37-year-old woman,  she lives with her partner and has 1 son, age 14, and one daughter, age 16. She works in agriculture. She is a good mother, strong, spirited, steady, determined, responsible and very hardworking. She works in the ‘Jatun Pampa’ rural area. To get home she must cross the mighty waters of the river, by riding in an “oroya” (a tram consisting of a metal basket fastened to cables by straps). The area has a temperate climate year-round, with a temperature that varies during the day between 15-28 degrees Celsius (59-83 Fahrenheit).

Carmen has a dark complexion, brown eyes, and long black hair which she wears braided. She is of short stature, thin physique, and her dress is traditional (hat, shawl, and skirt). Her mother tongue is the Quechua that is spoken in the place, and she speaks Spanish due to the general culture and the work that she does.

She shares her life with her partner, who works in agriculture. They live in their own home built of adobe, brick and cement with a tin roof and dirt floor, which has electricity and well water drawn by an electric pump, but no plumbing or sewer connection. 

She works in agriculture, planting and harvesting the land, an occupation she shares with her partner and their children. Recently the national government decided to help these communities by giving them the right to use potable water; “in this place we never had potable water, we use water from the well and river, both are dirty and polluted ...” she says. The advantage is that her community already has potable water, the disadvantage is the lack of capital for the installation of potable water within the home. 

Her dream is to have potable water, she wants to install potable water for her kitchen, bathroom, and laundry, in order to stop using contaminated water. This is the first loan cycle with the institution in the 6 years since she has been building her house.

It is for these reasons that Carmen is requesting a loan for the installation of potable water in her kitchen, bathroom, and laundry, in order to stop using contaminated water.

loans.use: with the installation of potable water in her kitchen, bathroom, and laundry, in order to stop using contaminated water.

loans.name: Natig

texts.en:
Natig is a 25-year-old married man from Rustavi city. He has a wife and two little sons, and the family has no source of income apart from transfers from abroad. As the existing income is not enough for a four-member family, and Natig can’t find a job, he decided to start his own business.

All the financial institutions rejected his loan requests because of his unstable financial condition and lack of experience. After several unsuccessful attempts, he applied for credit from MFO Credo. His request was approved in the framework of the Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva, permitting the rural poor to start or re-start businesses.

With the requested amount of 2,000 USD, Natig will purchase a second-hand car and will start providing taxi service. He will serve local people through the city and also nearby villages, and will get his own income.

Natig will satisfy even the basic needs of his family and somehow will improve their living condition. He awaits your support and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase a car and start providing taxi service.

loans.name: Theophilus

texts.en:
Theophilus is an artisan from Ghana who specializes in carved African masks. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of raw materials, including wood, beads, brass plates, and sandpaper.

Theophilus has been selling through NOVICA since 2012. This is his story:

"I am a calm, humble and quiet person who also loves arts and crafts. When I was in primary school, I admired art and used to draw animals and images that I found. After school, I'd stop by the workshop of a local wood carver, Salihu, to observe him and his workers as they carved different objects out of raw wood. They really caught my attention, and I visited the workshop daily. Realizing my interest, Salihu offered to train me. I was most interested, so learning the skill was not a difficult thing. Within a short time, I could finish the carved items. At a certain point in time, my parents could not afford to further my education so I decided to continue learning under Salihu and pursue a career in this field. What inspires me most is when people express appreciation for my designs. It is my dream to one day become the owner of a well-established art workshop and be able to employ many workers to reduce the alarming rate of unemployment in my country."

"I am grateful to those of you who help fund my loan for your unfailing support. May God bless you all."

Use the link below to view Theophilus's carved African masks on the NOVICA site:
<a href="http://www.novica.com/kiva/8505">http://www.novica.com/kiva/8505

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of raw materials, including wood, beads, brass plates, and sandpaper

loans.name: Rosa Luara

texts.en:
Rosa Laura is a 34 old married woman who has 2 young sons. She and her husband work hard to take care of their children. She is asking for a $10,000.00 (ten thousand pesos) loan to finish the improvements she started at her house.

She is currently working at a pawn house and has taken previous loans and repaid them without problem.

loans.use: To finish her house improvements

loans.name: Nuhu

texts.en:
Nuhu is a Babban Gona maize farmer from Tawakiri Village. Nuhu joined Babban Gona to create a better life for his children. Through Babban Gona’s input loan, Nuhu will have access to the best farm inputs in the market such as fertilisers, herbicides and improved seeds that will help him earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize/ hectare, double the Nigerian national average of 14 bags. This will see him increase his household income considerably. 

Thanks to Babban Gona's support, Nuhu now has the opportunity to increase his yields and income and use his additional earnings to build a better home for his family.

loans.use: To purchase improved farm inputs that will increase farmer’s yields

loans.name: Bertha Patricia

texts.es:
Bertha es una mujer de 42 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y su negocio es la venta de refrescos y golosinas en su kiosco.
Ella es emprendedora, independiente, constante, amable, paciente, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘villa Fátima’ caracterizado por el comercio informal; camiones cargados de frutas, verduras y carne, llegan desde el norte de la ciudad para comercializarlos en el lugar por mayor, y por las paradas de transporte público con salidas a poblaciones del norte de la ciudad, de clima frio y ventoso, vientos que llegan de la cordillera a una altura de 3600 metros sobre el nivel del mar. 
Bertha es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello castaño largo lo usa amarrado, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con sus familiares que trabajan, viven en un cuarto propiedad de la familia construido de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de refrescos y golosinas en su kiosco; ella vende refrescos naturales hervidos, gaseosas, jugos, y golosinas como galletas, papas fritas, dulces, etc., “heredé este kiosco de mi suegra, antes me dedicaba a la costura pero el sedentarismo de esa actividad me trajo problemas de salud…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes continuos que acostumbran a tomar refrescos a diario, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la renovación de su kiosco que se encuentra oxidado y dañado por el tiempo. Su sueño es mejorar su negocio y recuperar su buena salud, ella desea invertir en la refacción de su kiosco metálico para mejorar sus ventas y cuidar la seguridad de sus productos. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que se dedica a esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Bertha solicita un préstamo para la refacción de su kiosco para atender mejor a sus clientes y cuidar la seguridad de su mercadería.
texts.en:
Bertha is a 42-year-old woman who is single, without children, and her business is selling refreshments and sweets in her kiosk. She is enterprising, independent, persevering, kind, patient, responsible, and very hardworking. She carries out her business in the ‘Villa Fátima’ zone, which is characterized by informal business; trucks carrying fruits, vegetables, and meat, arrive from the northern part of the city to sell wholesale, and for the public transportation stops with lines to the populations in the northern part of the city, with cold and windy climate, winds that arrive from the mountains at an altitute of 3600 meters above sea level.

Bertha has dark complexion, brown eyes, long dark hair that she wears tied back, short stature, and a strong build. Her native language is Aymará, which she speaks with her family. She speaks Spanish for general knowledge and for her business. She shares her life with her family members who work. They live in a room that belongs to the family built of brick and cement with a corrugated metal roof that has potable water, electricity, and a sewage system.

Her business is selling refreshments and sweets in her kiosk. She sells natural drinks, soda, juice, and sweets such as cookies, chips, candy, etc. “I inherited this kiosk from my mother-in-law. Before I worked in sewing, but the sedentary nature of this work brought me health problems…” she says. The advantage of her business is that she has continuous customers who are accustomed to drinking refreshments daily. The disadvantage is the lack of capital for the renovation of her kiosk that is now rusted and damaged due to time. Her dream is to improve her business and recover her good health. She wants to invest in the repair of her metal kiosk in order to improve her sales and keep her products secure. This is the first cycle of loans with the institution in two years that she has worked in this business.

Those are the reasons why Bertha requests a loan for the repair of her kiosk in order to serve her customers better and to keep her merchandise secure.

loans.use: to repair her kiosk in order to serve her customers better and to keep her merchandise secure.

loans.name: Filomena

texts.es:
Filomena es una mujer de 49 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 1 hijo de 17 años, y trabaja cultivando la tierra.
Ella es buena madre, constante, independiente, paciente, solidaria, fuerte, luchadora, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su trabajo lo realiza en la localidad del ‘Chapare’ área rural, localizada en el norte de la ciudad y caracterizada por una gran riqueza de fauna y flora, y por ser además es una de las zonas más lluviosas de la Tierra. De clima templado durante todo el año con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 15-28 grados centígrados.
Filomena es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su forma de vestir es tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), y su lengua materna es el Quechua que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que trabaja en agricultura, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de cerámica que cuenta con energía eléctrica y agua de pozo extraída mediante bomba eléctrica, no cuenta con alcantarillado. Ella se dedica a la agricultura, en específico al cultivo de cítricos como; la naranja, mandarina, lima, limón, etc., actividad que comparte con su pareja y con su hijo. Después de toda una vida sin acceso a agua potable, recientemente la gobernación nacional decidió ocuparse de estas comunidades otorgándoles el derecho al uso de agua potable, “el uso del agua potable solo era para la gente de la ciudad, estamos muy emocionados por beber agua limpia…” comenta. La ventaja de la zona donde vive es que ya cuenta con agua potable, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la instalación de agua potable dentro de su casa. Su sueño es beber agua potable, ella desea realizar la instalación de agua potable a su cocina, baño y lavandería para dejar de tomar agua de pozo y mejorar su salud. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que construye su casa.
Es por esos motivos que Filomena solicita un préstamo para la instalación de agua potable en su cocina, baño y lavandería para dejar de tomar agua de pozo y mejorar su salud.
texts.en:
Filomena is 49 years old. She lives with her partner and they have a 17-year-old son. She works as a farmer.
She is a good mother, reliable, independent, patient, helpful, a fighter, responsible and very hardworking. She works in a town of ‘Chapare’ rural area, located north of the city, characterized for rich fauna and flora, and for being one of the most rainy areas on Earth. Weather is mild throughout the year with temperatures between 59-82 F.
Filomena has dark skin, brown eyes, black, long hair that she braids, she is short and large, and she wears traditional clothes (hat, muslin and skirt), her first language is Quechua, spoken in the area and she also speaks Spanish for general knowledge and for work. She shares her life with her partner and they work in agriculture. They live in a house that they own built out of brick and cement with corrugated iron roofing and ceramic flooring. They have electricity and well water extracted by electric pump. They don't have a sewage system. She works in agriculture, specifically citrus fruits such as oranges, tangerines, limes, lemons, etc. She works with her husband and son. After a whole life without access to drinking water, a short time ago, the national government decided to take care of these communities granting them rights to drinking water, "the use of drinking water was only available to people in the city, we are very excited to have clean water..." she says. The advantage of this area is the access to drinking water, the disadvantage is the lack of capital to install a drinking water system inside her home. Her dream is to drink clean water. She wants to install this system in her kitchen, bathroom and laundry room so her family can stop drinking dirty water and improve her health. This is her first set of loans with this bank in 5 years since she started buinding her home.
For this reason, Filomena is asking for a loan to install a drinking water system in his kitchen, bathroom and laundry room so she can stop drinking well water and improve her health.

loans.use: to install drinking water in her kitchen, bathroom and laundry room to stop drinking well water and improve her health.

loans.name: Carmén

texts.es:
Carmen es una señora de 54 años, vive en una comunidad de Sololá, convive junto a su esposo donde procrearon 8 hijos, algunos de sus hijos cuentan con familia propia.
Carmen es una mujer dedicada a su familia y muy comprometida, en ayudar a su esposo para generar ingresos y así contribuir en los gastos de la casa, para poder sacar adelante a su familia, Carmen desde muy pequeña creció y trabajo al lado de si mamá y heredo el oficio con su mamá, y con el que apoyaba a su familia, ella ahora trabaja  en oficios domésticos en lugares circunvecinas donde ella vive.
 Ella desde hace varios años, cuenta con una vivienda pero el anhelo de Carmen es conseguir  un préstamo para ayudar a su esposo en remodelar  su casa  compra de arena y pisos y tener un lugar más digno para sus hijos.

El gran sueño de Carmen es poder tener una casa en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Carmen, age 54, lives in the community of Sololá along with her husband. They have raised eight children, some of whom are grown with their own families now.

Carmen is entirely dedicated to her family. She is committed to helping her husband earn money and contribute to the household expenses, getting her family ahead. Since she was little, Carmen worked alongside her mother, learning her trade so that she could support her family. Today, she does domestic work in the neighboring areas around her home.

For several years, they have owned their home, but Carmen's goal is to get a loan so that she can help her husband remodel the house, buying sand and flooring material to provide their children with a more dignified place to live. Carmen's biggest dream is to own a home in better condition.

loans.use: buy sand and flooring

loans.name: Leidy Johana

texts.es:
Leidy, de 24 años, tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere para su vida y está decidida a culminar sus estudios para salir adelante y tener una buena vida.

Ella desea desempeñarse como vendedora de mercancía variada tales como ropa, accesorios como billeteras y algunos cosméticos, entre otros, en el municipio de Yarumal.

Esta actividad desea iniciarla con el afán de buscar los recursos necesarios para su sostenimiento y para sus estudios, además de poder contribuir con los gastos en su hogar.
Es una mujer emprendedora y muy disciplinada.

Ella solicita un crédito para comprar un amplio surtido de ropa al por mayor y de este modo aprovechar la oportunidad que le presenta la Corporación Interactuar de ser independiente.

Tiene la esperanza de poder progresar como empresaria y tener unos ingresos más estables y agradece a todas las personas que puedan contribuir con su sueño.
texts.en:
Leidy, who is 24 years old, is very sure about what she wants for her life and is dedicated to finishing her studies so she can move forward and have a good life. 

She wants to work as a saleswoman, selling merchandise such as clothing, accessories like wallets, and some cosmetics, among other things, in the town of Yarumal. She wants to begin this work with hopes of finding the necessary resources to support herself and her studies, as well as being able to contribute towards household expenses. She is a hardworking, entrepreneurial woman. 

She is asking for a loan to buy a wide range of wholesale clothing and in this way take advantage of the opportunity that Corporación Interactuar is giving her to be independent. She hopes to be able to improve as a business owner and have more stable income. She thanks everyone who can contribute to her dream.

loans.use: to buy a wide range of wholesale clothing and in this way take advantage of the opportunity that Corporación Interactuar is giving her to be independent.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es:
Delia es una mujer de 62 años de edad, soltera, tiene un hijo independiente de 40 años, y su negocio es la venta de empanadas.
Ella es emprendedora, independiente, constante, paciente, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en el barrio ‘el retoño’ ubicado a 20 kilómetros de la ciudad, se caracteriza por su riqueza artesanal en arcilla y produce principalmente; vasijas, macetas para plantas y otros artículos que son para uso del lugar. De clima cálido sub tropical con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 21-35 grados centígrados.
Delia es de tez trigueña, ojos marrones, cabello gris largo lo usa amarrado, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su hijo que trabaja y es independiente, viven en una casa propiedad de la familia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de cemento que cuenta con agua de pozo extraída mediante bomba, energía eléctrica y no cuenta con alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de empanadas, como; Empanada de queso frita (Masa delgada de harina de trigo rellena con queso y frita en aceite, con azúcar en polvo espolvoreada encima al servir),  Empanada de jigote (Masa delgada de harina de trigo rellena con mezcla de carne o pollo y verduras y frita en aceite), Masaco de yuca (Yuca hervida y aplastada mezclada con queso o trocitos de cerdo o charque de res),  Arepas (Panqueques de harina de maíz mezclados con queso y fritos), y otros, actividad que realiza en su domicilio en un cuarto habilitado como salón de té, “a mi edad soy independiente y manejo mi propio negocio…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que es propio, la desventaja es la falta de capital para abastecer su negocio con insumos de cocina como; harina, leche, huevos, carne, yuca, etc., su sueño es mejorar su negocio, ella desea realizar la compra de insumos de cocina para la elaboración de empanadas típicas tradicionales. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 15 años que se dedica a esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Delia solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos de cocina para elaborar empanadas y mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Delia, age 62, is single and has a 40-year-old son, now independent. Her business is selling empanadas, a type stuffed pastry. She is enterprising, independent, reliable, patient, responsible, and very hard-working. She runs her business from the El Retoño neighborhood, about 20 kilometers from the city. The area is notable for its artistic tradition, producing primarily urns, flowerpots, and other household items. The warm, subtropical climate yields daytime temperatures between 21-35C (70-95F).

Delia has olive skin, brown eyes, and long gray hair that she wears braided. She is short, of medium build, and her native language is Guaraní, which she speaks at home. She also speaks Spanish in public and for business. She lives with her son, who works and is independent. They live in a family home built of brick and cement with a corrugated metal roof and cement floor. They get water by pumping it from a well; they have electricity, but not wastewater services. 

Her business is selling empanadas, including
* Empanada de queso frita: corn flour dough, filled with cheese and fried in oil, served dusted with powdered sugar
* Empanada de jigote: corn flour dough stuffed with a mix of beef or chicken and vegetables, then fried in oil
* Masaco de yuca: yucca root boiled and crushed, mixed with cheese, bits of pork, or beef jerky
* Arepas: Pancakes made from corn flower, mixed with cheese and beans
and more. She works from home in a room set up as a tea house. "At my age, I'm independent and I'm running my own business," she says.

The advantage of her business is that it is her own. The disadvantage is that she doesn't have the capital to supply her business with the kitchen supplies she needs, like flour, milk, eggs, milk, yucca, and more. Her goal is to improve her business; she wants to purchase the ingredients to she needs to make her traditional empanadas. This is her first loan with the institution in fifteen years of running the business.

loans.use: buy ingredients to make and sell empanadas

loans.name: Victor

texts.en:
Victor has owned 7 Stars Auto Repair, a general mechanic shop, for over a year. After 40 years of working as a manager at various large companies, Victor decided to start his own venture in an industry that he is passionate about. He first got his start in the auto repair business as a young man, learning from friends who were mechanics how to fix his own cars. He has since taken mechanic classes to further his knowledge.

Victor is dedicated to supporting his family and providing jobs for members of his community. Since opening, he has created two jobs for mechanics. He hopes to hire two to three more employees as his business grows.

Victor will use his Kiva loan for a down payment to purchase a second car lift, enabling his business to fix more than one car at a time.

loans.use: to pay for a down payment to purchase a second car lift

loans.name: Cristobal

texts.es:
Cristóbal es un hombre de 30 años vive en una comunidad llamado Pacamanche, tiene tres hijos y todos son menores de edad. 
Cristóbal vive en una zona donde se produce mucho banano, pues viendo toda esta producción él desde hace 5 años tomo la iniciativa de dedicarse al cultivo y venta de banano, por los años de experiencia conoce  y  produce una diversidad   de bananos, él es muy reconocido por la gente por la calidad de producto que cultiva y vende, pues gracias a Dios el siempre vende, y esta es la manera como Cristóbal genera sus ingresos. Ahora Cristóbal con el afán de incrementar un poco más su cultivo ha tomado la decisión de adquirir un préstamo para la compra de un terreno donde tiene pensado sembrar más bananos para la próxima temporada.
Cristóbal en el futuro espera construir dos casas  para que su familia cuente con un hogar más digno.
texts.en:
Cristóbal is a 30 year old man. He lives in a community called Pacamanche. He has three children and all of them are minors. 

Cristóbal lives in an area where a lot of bananas are grown. Seeing all of the production, five years ago he took the initiative to start growing and selling bananas. Because of his years of experience he knows and produces and diversity of bananas. He is very well known by people for the quality of the product he grows and sells. Thanks be to God, he always sells and this is the way Cristóbal generates his income. Now, in order to increase his crop a little more, Cristóbal has decided to acquire a loan to buy some land where he is planning to plant more bananas for the next season.

In the future, Cristóbal hopes to build two houses so that his family can have a more worthy home.

loans.use: to buy land to cultivate.

loans.name: Ana De Jesus

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer de carácter dulce,  descubrió su vocación para el comercio desde una temprana edad, el casarse y procrear familia la alejo de su idea de ser una pequeña empresaria, pero hace un par de años, decidió retomar, abriendo una pulpería en su hogar, esta mujer logro surtir su negocio y obtener una mayor clientela. 
En estos momentos, Ana, desea incluir nuevos productos, en su tienda, y comprar abarrotes y productos de limpieza para el hogar. Es por eso que solicita un préstamo de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, para que se le beneficie, dándole la oportunidad de ampliar su variedad de productos a ofrecer a sus clientes. En un futuro desea mejorar la infraestructura de su local, además de hacer de su negocio una distribuidora.
texts.en: Ana is a woman with a sweet personality. She discovered her vocation for commerce since she was very young. When she got married and started a family, she moved away from the idea of becoming a small businesswoman, but just some years ago, she decided to start again and opened a grocery store in her house. This woman was able to stock up her business and get more customers. Currently, Ana wants to include new products in her store, and to buy grocery store items and household cleaning products. This is the reason she is requesting a loan to Kiva and MiCrédito, so that she benefits and gets the opportunity to expand the variety of the products she offers her customers. In the future, she wants to improve her store's infrastructure, also making her store a distribution center.

loans.use: to buy grocery store items and household cleaning products.

loans.name: Lyndiane 2Nd Pont Group

texts.fr: Le banc villageois a été inauguré le 09 Mai 2001. Ce groupe est constitué de huit membres dont toutes des femmes et qui remboursent leurs prêts à temps. Elles exercent toutes le commerce. Madame Fatou qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est veuve, âgée de 50 ans et mère de cinq enfants dont trois filles. Elle s'active dans la vente de l'huile de palme et du citron depuis plus de dix années. Elle va acheter avec le prêt sollicité plusieurs bidons d'huile de palme et du citron. Elle est très dynamique et très douée, étant veuve elle a en charge toute sa famille. Les bénéfices vont servir à la prise en charge de sa famille( nourriture, santé, éducation et habillement).
texts.en: The ’banc villageois’ was created on May 9, 2001. This group is composed of eight members, all women,  who pay pay back their loans on time. They all work in commerce. Ms. Fatou, appearing at the right with a hand raised, is the group's representative. She is a widow, 50 years old, and the mother of five children, including three girls. Ms. Fatou has been active in selling palm oil and limes for over six year. With the loan requested, she is going to purchase several containers of palm oil and some limes. She is very energetic and talented. As a widow, she supports her entire family. The profits will be used to cover family expenses (food, healthcare, education, and clothing).

loans.use: to purchase palm oil and limes

loans.name: Audelia Cecilia

texts.es:
Audelia, es una mujer de treinta y nueve años de edad, siendo madre de cuatro varones, ha logrado sacar adelante su pulpería. Su esposo la apoya y le celebra su espíritu emprendedor. Gracias a tres préstamos de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, esta esforzada fémina, ha vuelto su negocio estable y ganado fieles clientes que siempre encuentran, los productos que buscan. 
Como ella sabe que puede crecer más y cuenta con el apoyo de Kiva y MiCrédito, ha vuelto a solicitar un préstamo, el cual invertirá  en la compra de granos básicos, como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, cereales entre otros. En un futuro pretende hacer de su pulpería una distribuidora importante de granos básicos y otros productos.
texts.en:
Audelia is a woman of 39 and is the mother of four sons. She has managed to move forward with her grocery store. Her husband supports her and celebrates her entrepreneurial spirit. Thanks to three loans from Kiva, together with MiCrédito, this hard-working woman has made her business stable and earned loyal customers who always find the products they are looking for.

As she knows that she can grow more and have the support of Kiva and Mi Crédito, she is again applying for a loan, which she will invest in the purchase of basic grains such as rice, beans, sugar, and other grains, as well as other items. 

In the future, she plans to make her grocery store an important distributor of basic grains and other products.

loans.use: to buy basic grains such as rice, beans, sugar, and other grains, as well as other items.

loans.name: Grupo Aldea Chuachinup Sector 1 Group

texts.es:
Catarina es una mujer de 31 años soltera, tiene una hija de cinco años que estudia en la escuela de su comunidad donde viven, esta familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Catarina (señora que aparece de primero en el lado derecho de la foto) es una persona muy trabajadora, ella aprovecha su tiempo al máximo pero sin descuidar a su hija, ella para darle lo mejor se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa típica desde la comunidad de su casa y en algunos lugares circunvecinos, este negocio lo aprendió con su mamá. Ella ahora lleva seis años dedicándose a esta labor.
De esta manera Catarina con sus ingresos complementa los gastos de todo lo que consumen, para que su hija viva en armonía, pues el anhelo de ella es invertir  más en este negocio, para generar más ingresos y hacer del negocio cada día más grande. Pues para lograr este anhelo ella solicita un préstamo que le servirán para comprar más ropas típicas, pues como se mencionó anteriormente ella vende en su casa pues con la ayuda de esta institución si lograra el préstamo, ella en futuro con las ganancias comprar más mercadería  e instalar un local, pero también anhela una carreta para vender papas.
texts.en:
Catarina is a single woman of 31. She has a 5-year-old daughter who goes to the school in the community where they live. This family lives in a community of Sololá.

Catarina (the woman who appears first on the right side of the photo) is a very hard-working person. She makes maximum use of her time, but without neglecting her daughter. In order to give her the best, she works buying and selling traditional clothing of the community from her house and in some neighboring places. She learned this business from her mother. She has now been doing this work for six years.

In this way, Catarina meets the expenses of everything they use with her income, so that her daughter can live in harmony. Her goal is to invest more in this business in order to generate more income and make the business bigger and bigger. Now, in order to achieve this desire, she is applying for a loan that will serve her to buy more traditional clothing. As was mentioned earlier, she sells in her house, so with the help of this institution, if she obtains the loan, in the future she will buy more merchandise and will set up a shop, but she also longs for a cart to sell potatoes.

loans.use: to buy and sell traditional clothing.

loans.name: Grupo Agrícola Patzite Costa Ll Group

texts.es:
Estela es una mujer  que tiene una visión muy clara para prosperar con su familia, ella es una madre de 23 años de edad, es casada y actualmente vive en una comunidad denominada Nahualá, ella tiene una linda hija de tres años.
Estela (es la tercera de la primera fila de izquierda a derecha) es una mujer que le gusta apoyar a su familia, ella se dedica al cultivo de café, desde hace cuatro años, pues a ella le llamo la atención y empezó con este trabajo, ella quiere cosechar en esta temporada una buena calidad de café pero para lograrlo tendrá que invertir un poco más en la compra de fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra, para que su cultivo al final le genere una buena ganancia, pero una de las dificultades que ella tiene es no contar con el capital suficiente para poder cubrir los gastos del mantenimiento, es por ello que acude a un préstamo.
El gran anhelo de Estela es que su producción sea la mejor para poder construir su casa de terraza e instalar un negocio.
texts.en:
Estela is a woman who has a very clear vision to prosper with her family. She is a 23-year-old mother. She is married and now lives in a community called Nahualá. She has a lovely 3-year-old daughter.

Estela (she is the third one in the first row, going from left to right) is a woman who likes to support her family. She has been raising coffee for four years, since this work called her attention and she began it. She wants to harvest good quality coffee this season, but in order to achieve this, she will need to invest a little more in the purchase of fertilizers and pay for labor so that in the end her crop will generate good earnings for her. But one of the difficulties that she has is not having sufficient capital to be able to cover the expenses of the maintenance. It is for this reason that she has turned to a loan.

Estela's great desire is that her production be the best in order to be able to construct her house with a terrace and set up a business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for labor.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos es una ama de casa, a pesar de su edad ella, es una señora muy dedica a su trabajo, y muy responsable con su hijos ella es mujer viuda de 61 años, tiene 11  hijos siete mujeres y cuatro hombres todos ellos ya mayores de edad.

Ella durante toda su vida siempre le ha gustado el tejido artesanal para venderlos en los lugares circunvecinos, ya que con este oficio ella apoya a su familia con los gastos de la casa y con este trabajo ha sacado adelante a sus hijos.

Ella a pesar de ser una mujer y una persona grande, siempre ha soñado contar con una casa con más ambientes, para que sus hijos puedan tener mejor comodidad, ella está buscando un préstamo para apoyar a sus hijos, para realizar este trabajo, compra de materiales como: cemento, cal arena, pues con las ganancias que genera sus tejidos ella pagaría el préstamo lo más antes que pueda. Este es el sueño más grande de Santos.
texts.en:
Santos is a housewife who, in spite of her age, is very dedicated to her work and very responsible with her children. She is a 61 year old widow with 11 children, seven female and four male, all of whom are now adult. 

All her life she has liked to make handmade fabric items which she sells in the neighboring areas, since by this work she helps her family with household expenses and with this work she provided for her children.

In spite of being a woman and older, she has always dreamed of having a house with more rooms, so that her children can be more comfortable.She is seeking a loan in support of her children in order to buy materials such as cement, lime and sand in order to get the work done. With the earnings that her fabric handicrafts generate she would repay the loan as soon as possible. This is Santos' biggest dream.

loans.use: To buy cement, lime, sand.

loans.name: Kuña Kyrey Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Comité de Mujeres Kuña Kyrey está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde las 19 integrantes se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir, se encuentran en una situación de pobreza extrema, donde cada una quiere mejorar sus condiciones de vida para poder ayudar a sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Carmen, quien se dedica a la venta de ropa y, por medio de su esfuerzo, y sumado a su arduo trabajo, lucha por poder crecer y mejorar cada día, ya que a través de sus ventas ayuda a su familia con los ingresos para darles todo lo que necesitan. Ella se destaca en el grupo por su entusiasmo, lucha y sacrificio.
La Sra. Carmen pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas varias para la venta, como ser: remeras, jeans, camisas, pantalones, y otros, para poder invertir en sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Agradecen por la oportunidad que están recibiendo de mejorar.
texts.en:
